sentence.Network_en: The Agheila defile was kernel of the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿盖拉隘路是全局的核心.

sentence.Network_en: The troops had to defile through the pass.
sentence.Network_cn: 部队只得排成单列通过关口.

sentence.Network_en: Who are these men who defile the grassy borders of our roads and lanes.
sentence.Network_cn: 是谁污损了我们大路和小路两旁的草坪.

list.abs: they climbed up the mountain through a defile ., 他们通过一条小路爬到山上.
you place defiled food on my altar . " But you ask ,' How have we defiled you ?' " By saying that the LORD'S table is contemptible .你们将污秽的食物献在我的坛上，且说，我们在何事上污秽你呢？因你们说，耶和华的桌子是可藐视的。
隘路;穴道,passage,... ... ) bottle neck 隘路 ) debouching march;defile march 隘路行军 ) a narrow mountain path 狭隘的山道.
she bestowed her harlotries on , all of whom were the choicest men of Assyria ; and with all whom she lusted after , with all their idols she defiled herself .阿荷拉就与亚述人中最美的男子放纵淫行，她因所恋爱之人的一切偶像，玷污自己。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of obsolete defoul, from Old French defouler 'trample down', influenced by obsolete befile 'befoul, defile'
late 17th cent.: from French défilé (noun), défiler (verb), from dé 'away from' + file 'column, file'

entry.def: To defile something that people think is important or holy means to do something to it or say something about it which is offensive.

example.ex: He had defiled the sacred name of the Holy Prophet.
example.tran: 他亵渎了这位神圣先知的圣名。

entry.tran: (通常指山中的)峡谷，峡道，隘路
entry.def: A defile is a very narrow valley or passage, usually through mountains.

means.word_mean: 1. a narrow pass (especially one between mountains)
1. place under suspicion or cast doubt upon;
2. make dirty or spotty, as by exposure to air; also used metaphorically;

sentences.sentence: "The silver was tarnished by the long exposure to the air"
"Her reputation was sullied after the affair with a married man"
"The townspeople defiled the river by emptying raw sewage into it"

auth_sentence.content: Let us not forget that hatred, envy adn pride defile our lives!
auth_sentence.res_content: Let us not forget that hatred, envy adn pride defile our lives!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let us not forget that hatred, envy adn pride defile our lives!

auth_sentence.content: It makes it all the more shocking that somebody would defile our heritage.
auth_sentence.res_content: It makes it all the more shocking that somebody would defile our heritage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It makes it all the more shocking that somebody would defile our heritage.

auth_sentence.content: Yet websites defile my computer on a regular basis.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet websites defile my computer on a regular basis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet websites defile my computer on a regular basis.

sentences.en: I felt defiled by the filth.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这些脏话玷污了我。
